resources.string: EXPLANATION: This are the top Artist of this week in the IC Music App. Our listeners have listening to this 5 songs more than any other for the last 7 days
New artist comes out with a new album

EXPLANATION: Here it explain the news and the body of all the information i.e.: New album came out the 17th of March afters launching the new single at the beggining of the year, this was a really expected and second album of the band. This will be pull as a longer version of the RSS feed

EXPLANATION: The main screen gives access to the latest news about music. On the top right the user can directly access to the TOP 5 artist, TOP 5 albums and TOP 5 songs of the week. The news will be added by an RSS feed class
EXPLANATION: This screen is the main music player activity displaying album cover and a media player. The MediaPlayer class will be used to play music
